alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 04 at 4:40PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...ICY CONDITIONS DEVELOPING FOR THE EVENING COMMUTE... Temperatures are expected to drop to around 30 through 6pm with light freezing rain and freezing drizzle developing across the region. The freezing rain may coat roadways and walkways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly. Locations impacted include... Jersey City, Jamaica, Elizabeth, Flatbush, Bayonne, Levittown, Plainfield, Freeport, Linden, Valley Stream, Long Beach, Plainview, Coney Island, Garden City and Massapequa. A Winter Weather Advisory is in effect for the area. Please monitor local media outlets and the National Weather Service for further statements.
